scripts.backend:cleanenv: cd starter/udagram-api/www && eb terminate --force Hostingfullstack && eb create Hostingfullstack
scripts.backend:setenv: eb setenv PORT=$PORT  POSTGRES_USERNAME=$POSTGRES_USERNAME  POSTGRES_PASSWORD=$POSTGRES_PASSWORD  POSTGRES_DB=$POSTGRES_DB    PORT_DB=$PORT_DB    POSTGRES_HOST=$POSTGRES_HOST   AWS_REGION=$AWS_REGION    AWS_BUCKET=$AWS_BUCKET  JWT_SECRET=$JWT_SECRET
scripts.backend:deploy: cd starter/udagram-api/www && eb use Hostingfullstack &&  eb deploy Hostingfullstack
scripts.backend:all: npm run backend:cleanenv && npm run backend:setenv && npm run backend:deploy
